mapper.select: SELECT userid, username, password, nickname, roleid, icon, sex, status, email, iphone FROM user WHERE username = #{params.username} AND password = #{params.password}
SELECT userid, username, password, nickname, roleid, icon, sex, status, email, iphone FROM user WHERE userid = #{id}

SELECT userid, username, password, nickname, roleid, icon, sex, status, email, iphone FROM user
AND username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.username}, '%')
OR nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.nickname}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, nickname, roleid, sex, status) VALUES (#{params.username}, #{params.password}, #{params.nickname}, #{params.roleId}, #{params.sex}, #{params.status})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET username = #{params.username}, password = #{params.password}, nickname = #{params.nickname}, roleid = #{params.roleId}, icon = #{params.icon}, sex = #{params.sex}, status = #{params.status}, email = #{params.email}, iphone = #{params.iphone} WHERE userid = #{params.userId}
